thread.title_full: Basketball. Rinascita's youth team suffers a double defeat in Faenza - Quotidiano Sportivo

author: Quotidiano Sportivo
title: Basketball. Rinascita's youth team suffers a double defeat in Faenza - Quotidiano Sportivo
text:
Basketball. Rinascita's youth team suffers a double defeat in Faenza. A weekend of double defeats for the elite youth teams associated with Rinascita Basket Rimini. Coach Calzolari's Under-19 team, once again... di Sports Editorial October 23, 2025 A weekend of double defeats for the elite youth teams associated with Rinascita Basket Rimini. Coach Calzolari's Under-19 team, once again...
Weekend with double defeat, for the excellent youth teams linked to Rimini Basketball Rebirth . Under 19 coach Calzolari, still without Sankare after the injury of the first team winger Dole in Mestre, remains in the lead for three quarters in Faenza, but in the end the Raysolaris wins 84-81. After a very prolific first quarter which ended 21-34, at half time the home team closes the gap (41-48) and at the end of the third quarter they overtake (65-63). The match remains extremely balanced, but in the end the home team has the upper hand thanks to the form of Aromando (24). The Angels/Rbr scoreboard: Almasi 11, Sankare ne, Ronci 22, Longo 3, Tura, Amaroli 2, Facciorusso 6, Frisoni 19, Luppino, Della Chiesa 18. Coach: Calzolari.
The team's home game was of a completely different tone. Under 17 , once again against Raggisolaris Faenza The Angels/Rbr fall 46-85, with a very problematic start of 0-14 and an equally complicated continuation. The Clementines still remain well behind at the end of the first half (7-24), and it is above all in the second that they express maximum effort and close at 26-38. In the second half Faenza extends thanks to a dominant Mouhamadou (35). At the end of the third it is 37-65 and in the home straight Raggisolaris runs rampant up to +39. The scoreboard: Trevisani 8, Ugliola 3, Ceccolini 3, Facciorusso 9, Valdinoci, Ndiaye, Bontempi 6, Tura 6, Angelilli 2, Del Core 2, Luppino 7, Fascicolo. Coach: BrugÃ¨. In the next round, the Under 17s will challenge Virtus in Bologna (Saturday 25th at 17.30pm), while the Under 19s will host Jesi at the PalaSgr (Monday 27th at 20pm).
